initiate.description: Create an auth key. Also specify is key should be long or short.

revoke.description: Revoke a key, it will no longer be honoured. It's underlying user's sessions will also be invalidated.

extend.description: Extend a key's life, it will be honoured for longer.

get_token.description: Will return a user_session token for the underlying user. Will fail if key has been revoked/expired.
